serviceDescription.title: Dia migration service.
serviceDescription.description: Migration of formats that can be handled by Dia. E.g. migration from Dia files to a variety of other formats such as Fig, SVG and PNG, but also migration between non-Dia formats. E.g. migration from Fig to SVG.

tool.name: dia
tool.description:
Dia is roughly inspired by the commercial Windows program 'Visio', though more geared towards informal diagrams for casual use. It can be used to draw many different kinds of diagrams. It currently has special objects to help draw entity relationship diagrams, UML diagrams, flowcharts, network diagrams, and many other diagrams. It is also possible to add support for new shapes by writing simple XML files, using a subset of SVG to draw the shape.
It can load and save diagrams to a custom XML format (gzipped by default, to save space), can export diagrams to a number of formats, including EPS, SVG, XFIG, WMF and PNG, and can print diagrams (including ones that span multiple pages).
